h3&#123;font-size:18px&#125;&#125;</style><p>我正在参加「码上掘金挑战赛」详情请看：<a href="https://juejin.cn/post/7139728821862793223" target="_blank" title="https://juejin.cn/post/7139728821862793223">码上掘金挑战赛来了！</a></p>
<h1 data-id="heading-0">灵感来源</h1>
<p>我是重度古风爱好者，早年看到优美又有意境的图片，我只会点赞并默默的存下来当壁纸。</p>
<p>后来，我努力修炼CSS内功心法，终于，有一天我尝试实现一幅国画，虽然最终的画作，笔锋僵硬，线条流畅感不足，但是最起码我起步了。</p>
<p>我迈出第一步之后，从此在这条路上越跑🏃🏻‍♀️越欢快。灵感创意也是源源不断，如果给我足够的时间，没准我能开个画展。（晚上做梦不过分吧。）</p>
<p>话再说回来，对一件事的追求和热爱就是我灵感最好的来源。</p>
<h1 data-id="heading-1">白露暧秋色</h1>
<p>前几天是二十四节气的白露，话说咱们中华的二十四节气，不但是对自然的合理解读，名字还十分优美。</p>
<p>白露节气的文学贡献也是有目共睹的。很多大文豪写了白露有关的诗句，什么“露从今夜白，月是故乡明”，什么“明朝交白露，此夜起金风”，什么“白露黄花自绕篱，幽香深谢好风吹”，什么“白露暧秋色，月明清漏中”。</p>
<p>白露时节，各地习俗上也很有趣，酿米酒🍶，喝白露茶🍵，吃龙眼。足见祖国的地大物博。</p>
<p>而我这次的创意主要集中在白露的习俗上，所以接下来我将米酒、茶、龙眼等元素集合到了我的画作中。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-2">画</h2>
<p><span href="https://code.juejin.cn/pen/7143489417259270177" target="_blank" class="code-editor-container"><iframe class="code-editor-frame" data-code="code-editor-element" data-code-id="7143489417259270177" data-src="https://code.juejin.cn/pen/7143489417259270177" style="display: none" loading="lazy"></iframe></span></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-3">理想怎么照进现实</h2>
<p>以上面这幅图为例，跟大家分享一下，我是怎么具体实现一副画作的。</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-4">照猫画虎</h3>
<p><strong>border-radius妙用</strong></p>
<p>各种带弧度的闭合图形，大多可以通过为元素添加border-radius属性，设置元素的四个角的值实现的。</p>
<p>关键在于四个角的值可以不同。</p>
<p>更关键的是其实可以四个参数可以细分成八个参数。所以有了如下的等价转换：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css"><span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span> <span class="hljs-number">20%</span> / <span class="hljs-number">10%</span> <span class="hljs-number">40%</span>;
<span class="hljs-comment">/* 等价于： */</span>
<span class="hljs-attribute">border-top-left-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span> <span class="hljs-number">10%</span>;
<span class="hljs-attribute">border-top-right-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">20%</span>  <span class="hljs-number">40%</span>;
<span class="hljs-attribute">border-bottom-right-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span> <span class="hljs-number">10%</span>;
<span class="hljs-attribute">border-bottom-left-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">20%</span> <span class="hljs-number">40%</span>;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p><strong>CP搭配，效果翻倍</strong></p>
<p>物品的上下或者左右相差较大时，建议采用组合图形。比如上面的茶壶，壶体我就用了两个图形叠放在一起，上面是半圆，下面是椭圆。有色差，更古朴。</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-5">善用伪类、伪元素</h3>
<p>不想多加一层嵌套或者多写一行代码的时候，多半用伪类或伪元素可以实现。比如茶壶上面的小帽子。没错，我就用了一个::before伪元素给它画出来了。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.teapot-inner</span><span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::before</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">content</span>: <span class="hljs-string">''</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">8px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">12px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#b4dd85</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: -<span class="hljs-number">12px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">left</span>: <span class="hljs-number">36px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1px</span> solid <span class="hljs-number">#9db780</span>;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-6">趣味性</h3>
<p><strong>背景渐变</strong></p>
<p>一行代码，图形瞬间闪亮✨。想要背景要层次background的radial-gradient了解一下。</p>
<p><strong>元素阴影</strong></p>
<p>外阴影帮助元素塑造立体感，内阴影，不但可以营造凹陷的效果，还能实现物品内有填充物的效果。比如米酒瓶里装米酒的效果，就是在酒瓶的元素上加了box-shadow属性，并设置为内阴影。</p>
<p><strong>动画特性</strong></p>
<p>提起效果的趣味性，很难不想到animation动画，什么跑啊、跳啊、倒挂金钩啊、白露坠落，惊起涟漪啊，都可以用animation实现。</p>
<p><strong>2D、3D转换</strong></p>
<p>旋转跳跃伸伸缩缩，元素排成排略显呆板，那就用transform让它们换个角度。比如笸箩上的树叶，都是一个方向，摆盘不太美观，将叶子换换方向，美观感立马提升。</p>
<p>基础实现方案就介绍到这了，下面讲讲画作的具体实现方案。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-7">露珠</h2>
<p>配合白露时节的特点，标题增加了一颗露珠环绕的效果，平添几分乐趣。</p>
<p>露珠环绕的效果相对比较简单，加了一个父容器，父容器是圆形，其实是父容器在顺时针环绕。</p>
<p>露珠本身实现还是相对难一些的。</p>
<ul>
<li>背景颜色做了渐变处理，背景颜色的渐变通过设置radial-gradient的值实现，设置颜色不同的透明度，在露珠经过标题时不会遮挡文字。</li>
<li>设置四个角不同的弧度值，可以让元素展示成一个不规则的形状。</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.droplet</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">20px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">74px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">z-index</span>: <span class="hljs-number">999</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
&#125;
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.droplet</span><span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::after</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">content</span>: <span class="hljs-string">''</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">14px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">14px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span> <span class="hljs-number">84%</span> <span class="hljs-number">96%</span> <span class="hljs-number">88%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">radial-gradient</span>(ellipse at <span class="hljs-number">22%</span> <span class="hljs-number">20%</span>, <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">218</span>, <span class="hljs-number">232</span>, <span class="hljs-number">232</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.4</span>) <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">218</span>, <span class="hljs-number">232</span>, <span class="hljs-number">232</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.8</span>) <span class="hljs-number">28%</span>, <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">218</span>, <span class="hljs-number">232</span>, <span class="hljs-number">232</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>) <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>);
  <span class="hljs-attribute">box-shadow</span>: <span class="hljs-number">2px</span> <span class="hljs-number">2px</span> <span class="hljs-number">15px</span> <span class="hljs-number">5px</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">77</span>, <span class="hljs-number">135</span>, <span class="hljs-number">157</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.4</span>), <span class="hljs-number">5px</span> <span class="hljs-number">5px</span> <span class="hljs-number">6px</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">77</span>, <span class="hljs-number">135</span>, <span class="hljs-number">157</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.8</span>), <span class="hljs-number">5px</span> <span class="hljs-number">5px</span> <span class="hljs-number">40px</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">77</span>, <span class="hljs-number">135</span>, <span class="hljs-number">157</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.4</span>), <span class="hljs-number">5px</span> <span class="hljs-number">5px</span> <span class="hljs-number">60px</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">77</span>, <span class="hljs-number">135</span>, <span class="hljs-number">157</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.6</span>), -<span class="hljs-number">3px</span> -<span class="hljs-number">3px</span> <span class="hljs-number">5px</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">255</span>, <span class="hljs-number">255</span>, <span class="hljs-number">255</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.8</span>) inset;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">rotate</span>(<span class="hljs-number">20deg</span>);
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">7px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">left</span>: <span class="hljs-number">7px</span>;
&#125;
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.droplet1</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">87px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">left</span>: <span class="hljs-number">93px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">animation</span>: droplet1 <span class="hljs-number">3s</span> linear infinite;
&#125;
<span class="hljs-keyword">@keyframes</span> droplet1 &#123;
  <span class="hljs-selector-tag">from</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attribute">transform</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">rotate</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0deg</span>);
  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-selector-tag">to</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attribute">transform</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">rotate</span>(<span class="hljs-number">360deg</span>);
  &#125;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-8">印章</h2>
<p>我还做了一个自己的小印章，印章的形状是一个不规则的椭圆，所以实现的时候，是先将元素设置成椭圆，再设置四个角不同的弧度值，可以让元素展示成一个不规则的形状。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.yinzhang</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">16px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">24px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span> <span class="hljs-number">120%</span> <span class="hljs-number">120%</span> <span class="hljs-number">80%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">164px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">left</span>: <span class="hljs-number">96px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#f1f1f1</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">z-index</span>: <span class="hljs-number">99</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-weight</span>: <span class="hljs-number">600</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">208</span>, <span class="hljs-number">142</span>, <span class="hljs-number">138</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.7</span>);
  <span class="hljs-attribute">text-align</span>: center;
&#125;
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.yinzhang</span> <span class="hljs-selector-tag">span</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-size</span>: <span class="hljs-number">12px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">scale</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0.5</span>);
  <span class="hljs-attribute">line-height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">display</span>: inline-block;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">margin-top</span>: -<span class="hljs-number">4px</span>;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-9">米酒🍶</h2>
<p>酒杯是从上一篇秋月桂花图中借鉴过来的。</p>
<p>酒瓶，因为有文字，所以层级深一些。瓶子里装酒的效果是通过设置阴影实现的。CSS的box-shadow可以设置元素的外阴影也可以设置内阴影。这里就设置的内阴影，值后面加了inset。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.mijiu-inner</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">70px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">90px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#f1f1f1</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">40px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">left</span>: -<span class="hljs-number">17px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">box-shadow</span>: -<span class="hljs-number">8px</span> -<span class="hljs-number">38px</span> <span class="hljs-number">20px</span> <span class="hljs-number">2px</span> <span class="hljs-number">#f1e9cc</span> inset;
&#125;
......
<<span class="hljs-selector-tag">div</span> class='mijiu'>
  <<span class="hljs-selector-tag">div</span> class='mijiu-lid'></<span class="hljs-selector-tag">div</span>>
  <<span class="hljs-selector-tag">div</span> class='mijiu-bottleneck'></<span class="hljs-selector-tag">div</span>>
  <<span class="hljs-selector-tag">div</span> class='mijiu-inner'>
    <<span class="hljs-selector-tag">div</span> class='mijiu-text'>
      <<span class="hljs-selector-tag">div</span> class='mijiu-text-line mijiu-text-line1'></<span class="hljs-selector-tag">div</span>>
      <<span class="hljs-selector-tag">div</span> class='mijiu-text-line mijiu-text-line2'></<span class="hljs-selector-tag">div</span>>
      <<span class="hljs-selector-tag">div</span> class='mijiu-text-inner'>米</<span class="hljs-selector-tag">div</span>>
    </<span class="hljs-selector-tag">div</span>>
  </<span class="hljs-selector-tag">div</span>>
</<span class="hljs-selector-tag">div</span>>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-10">龙眼</h2>
<p>龙眼摘下了放到器皿上，这个器皿是中华特有的笸箩（[pǒ luo]）。</p>
<ul>
<li>顶部的面加了一圈内部的圆形线条，让它有内凹的效果。（好像不是特别明显）</li>
<li>下层的立体面用阴影实现的，借鉴的前篇月饼的实现方式。</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.poluo</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">120px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">60px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">90%</span> <span class="hljs-number">90%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1px</span> solid <span class="hljs-number">#210900</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#c8a590</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">box-shadow</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0px</span> <span class="hljs-number">4px</span> <span class="hljs-number">0px</span> <span class="hljs-number">0px</span> <span class="hljs-number">#bda596</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0px</span> <span class="hljs-number">10px</span> <span class="hljs-number">0px</span> <span class="hljs-number">0px</span> <span class="hljs-number">#cdb6a8</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0px</span> <span class="hljs-number">11px</span> <span class="hljs-number">0px</span> <span class="hljs-number">0px</span> <span class="hljs-number">#483e37</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">z-index</span>: <span class="hljs-number">99</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">rotateX</span>(<span class="hljs-number">40deg</span>);
  <span class="hljs-attribute">right</span>: -<span class="hljs-number">40px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: -<span class="hljs-number">20px</span>;
&#125;
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.poluo</span><span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::before</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">content</span>: <span class="hljs-string">''</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">110px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">left</span>: <span class="hljs-number">5px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">5px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1px</span> solid <span class="hljs-number">#210900</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">90%</span> <span class="hljs-number">90%</span>;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-11">白露茶🍵</h2>
<p>茶杯和酒杯基本是一样的实现方式。</p>
<p>茶壶复杂一些</p>
<ul>
<li>茶壶本身是两个形状拼接的上侧是半圆下侧是圆；</li>
<li>茶壶把手是一个圆环，通过遮挡实现了部分环的效果；</li>
<li>茶壶嘴将一个矩形进行了旋转和拉伸，所以有了倾斜的角度。</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.teapot</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">80px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">60px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">bottom</span>: -<span class="hljs-number">3px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">right</span>: -<span class="hljs-number">40px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">z-index</span>: <span class="hljs-number">110</span>;
&#125;
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.teapot-inner</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">80px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">30px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">80px</span> <span class="hljs-number">80px</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#2c9f8f</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">bottom</span>: <span class="hljs-number">2px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">left</span>: -<span class="hljs-number">1px</span>;

&#125;

<h3 data-id="heading-12">白露坠落，惊起涟漪</h3>
<p>这个效果还是有点意思的，也花了我一些心思和时间去实现它。</p>
<p>其实整个画面，相对而言图案较少，所以我想加一些动画效果，让整个画面更饱满一些。所以想到露珠坠落到茶杯，然后茶杯惊起一圈涟漪。</p>
<p>这两个动画要打配合，后面的涟漪效果设置了延迟，等露珠坠落的时候才会展示，所以需要一个时间差。</p>
<p>而露珠进入茶杯之后，会没入茶杯，消失不见。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.droplet2</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">3px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">right</span>: <span class="hljs-number">40px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">scale</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0.6</span>);
  <span class="hljs-attribute">animation</span>: droplet2 <span class="hljs-number">7s</span> ease-out infinite <span class="hljs-number">1s</span>;
&#125;
<span class="hljs-keyword">@keyframes</span> droplet2 &#123;
  <span class="hljs-number">0%</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">3px</span>;
    <span class="hljs-attribute">right</span>: <span class="hljs-number">40px</span>;
    <span class="hljs-attribute">opacity</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-number">70%</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">205px</span>;
    <span class="hljs-attribute">right</span>: <span class="hljs-number">77px</span>;
    <span class="hljs-attribute">opacity</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-number">74%</span> &#123;

    <span class="hljs-attribute">right</span>: <span class="hljs-number">77px</span>;

  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-number">78%</span> &#123;

  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-number">100%</span> &#123;

    <span class="hljs-attribute">opacity</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
  &#125;

<span class="hljs-selector-class">.wave</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">30px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;

<h2 data-id="heading-13">一排兔子捉迷藏 🐇</h2>
<p>我写完聊天群背景的文章之后，想到的这个功能，可以做一排卡通动物，逐个出来再下去的效果，应该挺有趣的。正好这次四个角，三个角放了白露习俗，最后一个角有点空荡荡的，就想着放个什么吧。于是就放了一排小兔子。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-scss copyable" lang="scss"><span class="hljs-keyword">@keyframes</span> rabbit &#123;
  <span class="hljs-number">0%</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">110px</span>;
  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-number">25%</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">90px</span>;
  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-number">50%</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">90px</span>;
  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-number">75%</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">110px</span>;
  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-number">100%</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">110px</span>;
  &#125;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h1 data-id="heading-14">总结</h1>
<p>经历了这段时间不断地创作，除了反应敏捷，实现快速之外，我代码下的物品相较之前少些僵硬，多了些趣味。</p>
<p>继续加油，继续创作。💪</p></div>  
</div>
